channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+6445] Stop The Madness Steve Jobs!
item.description: Apple has updated its developer terms, these new terms will shut down many current developers, and disallow many popular game engines and other apps. Now is the time for us to band together, spread the word, and help Stop The Madness.

item.title: [+4132] This picture gets funnier the more I look at it
[+4033] FW: FW: FW: Creative Writing Assignment
item.description: This image seems to be as old as the internet and looks like its been printed, cropped, scanned many times but that still doesn't make it any less hilarious.

item.title: [+3294] BREAKING! Conan O'Brien coming to TBS
item.description: According to a press release sent out by the cable network (which, like CNN, is a unit of Time Warner), the comedian is joining TBS to host a late-night show that is expected to debut in November. O'Brien's show will be followed on TBS' schedule by George Lopez's "Lopez Tonight," which will move to midnight.

item.title: [+2746] LOOK OUT BEHIND YOU
[+2650] Ruler?... Ruler?... Fuck It (pic)
[+2353] The World Would Be Better If Everyone Watched This Video
item.description: If every person on our blue Earth watched this video, the world would be a much better place. At least for a few minutes. Listen closely to Carl Sagan's words till the end. It won't fail to get you teary.

item.title: [+1548] Probably Not the Smartest Designated Smoking Area (PIC)
[+1527] Michele Bachmann is officially just making stuff up
item.description: She should have been a fiction writer: The GOP's other darling stopped by right-wing message outlet Fox News on Sunday with a claim that's so beyond wrong, anyone with the faintest idea of what is happening in US politics could see right through it.-=W/ VIDEO=-

item.title: [+1462] xkcd: Seat Selection
[+1343] Poison Apple [Pic]
[+1119] Battlenet's logic-defying 404 page (PIC)
item.description: Blizzard seems to be channeling Nicolas Cage.

item.title: [+1050] Why Priests Ought to Be Parents...[PIC]
item.description: Nick Anderson offers a different rationale for allowing Catholic priests to marry.

item.title: [+923] Can Android Overtake the iPhone?
item.description: Android is steadily becoming the go-to OS for smartphones and tablets. It's even showing up on some set-top boxes and smart Blu-Ray players. But it's in the smartphone and tablet spaces that the mobile OS will have its greatest impact. It's clear why many market research firms believe that Android might pose a threat to iPhone OS.

item.title: [+888] The Best Short Film You've Ever Seen (Video)
item.description: A.I. meets Children of Men in this Parallel Lines collection masterpiece.

item.title: [+817] 10 of the Biggest and Best Jumps Ever
item.description: Some of these are absolutely insane!

item.title: [+730] She’s Just Not That Into You (PIC)
[+655] Hallucinogenic Drugs Making Their Way Into Medicine
item.description: Scientists are taking a new look at hallucinogens, which became taboo among regulators after enthusiasts like Timothy Leary promoted them in the 1960s with the slogan “Turn on, tune in, drop out.” Now, using rigorous protocols and safeguards, scientists have won permission to study once again the drugs’ potential for treating mental problems.

item.title: [+641] Spiderman...is God?
[+641] Six Secret Fast-Food Menu Items
item.description: Secret menus must work, why else would so many fast food restaurants offer them?
